textContent:
Design a program that makes the rosters.

- Randomly asign hours based on preferences (or better yet, on what the employee can't do).
- Take into account days of the week when the employee can't go and specific dates when they have asked beforehand.
- Take into account shift preference (and assign it to each day of the week).
- Preferred number of hours per employee, without ever surpassing the weekly hour limit established.
- Take holidays into account.
- Export the output as a visual representation as an excel file, easily editable. The Manager/Supervisor's judgement is crucial.
